segments.text: Would you like to order now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This all looks good ! I think we know what we want .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Please let me point out the chef's special , which is blackened catfish .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am dieting , so could the chef prepare the food with no extra sauce ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are always happy to adjust our cooking to meet your needs .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me if there are any entrees that are vegetarian ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The cashew broccoli noodles or the cheese and veggie enchiladas would be an excellent choice .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am going to go with the grilled shrimp with garlic sauce . I would like the garlic sauce on the side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you like your salad brought to you with your entree , or would you like it served now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can serve our salads with our dinner .
segments.speaker: S2
